summary: The vehicle is driving on a narrow road. Initially, two people are unloading items from a truck parked on the right side of the road. As the vehicle progresses, it approaches an intersection where a three-wheeled vehicle is crossing. A pedestrian is also visible on the right side of the road.
actions: The vehicle is currently driving straight and maintaining its speed. The driver should be aware of the pedestrians and the three-wheeled vehicle at the intersection.
